summary: The Saving NOAA’s Workforce Act (S. 2633) proposes a moratorium on any reduction in force (RIF) at the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) until the full-year appropriations for fiscal year 2026 are enacted. This is intended to protect NOAA employees from potential job losses. The bill explicitly states this moratorium applies in addition to other relevant authorities concerning adverse personnel actions.
